rundown: 11-3 W @ Washington Nationals Spencer Strider: 7.0 innings, 1 earned run, 4 hits, 1 HR, 6 strikeouts Batters: Matt Olson (4 hits - 5 AB, 1 HR, 4 RBI) Drake Baldwin (3 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 4 RBI) Ronald Acuña Jr. (2 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 1 RBI) The Braves secured a decisive victory against the Washington Nationals, showcasing a powerful offensive performance and strong pitching. Key highlights include Matt Olson's standout game with 4 hits and 4 RBIs, Drake Baldwin contributing significantly with 3 hits and 4 RBIs, and Spencer Strider's dominant outing on the mound, allowing only 1 earned run over 7 innings. The Braves' offense was relentless, accumulating 16 hits and scoring in multiple innings to ensure a comfortable win.
